short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send WhatsApp messages to a single user to multiple users in bulk without saving number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Global TECH Bulk SMS Sender is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed to simplify your bulk messaging needs. Whether you're a business owner, marketer, or just someone looking to reach a large audience, this Chrome extension allows you to send personalized SMS and WhatsApp messages to multiple recipients with ease, directly from your browser.

Key Features:
- Bulk Messaging: Send messages to unlimited contacts in just a few clicks.
- Customization: Personalize each message with custom fields for a more tailored experience.
- Fast and Reliable: Enjoy swift delivery of messages with real-time status updates.
- Contact Management: Import and manage your contact lists effortlessly from Excel or CSV files.
- Multi-Platform Support: Send messages via WP SMS to engage your audience on their preferred platform.
Boost your communication efficiency with WA Global TECH Bulk Sender and connect with your audience instantly.
